<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_lookup_verify_config</collection> <condition>current.getValue('verification_fields') != null && current.getValue('verification_fields').split(',').length > 9</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Limit the number of verification fields</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { current.verification_fields.setError("Cannot add more than 9 fields"); current.setAbortAction(true);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>sanjay.kittur@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-12-12 03:35:36</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0b76698adb9a6300db2051735e9619df</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Limit the number of verification fields</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Lookup Verify" source="sn_lookup_verify">439a24b4b320230001f34d43c6a8dc6b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Lookup Verify">439a24b4b320230001f34d43c6a8dc6b</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_0b76698adb9a6300db2051735e9619df</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>sanjay.kittur@snc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-12-12 03:36:51</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0b76698adb9a6300db2051735e9619df"/> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Limit the number of verification fields
